subject: Order
description_text:
ï»¿Hello, if I will submit an order through the website, do you have a EU warehouse or I will
have to pay duties for the pedals? I live in Poland!

Thank you
Ilias

conversations.body_text: Hi ILIAS PELEKAS,    Yes, you can purchase on our official website. We will ship directly from Germany to you, with no customs duties required.
